name: 張文中
objective:
This Robotics and Automation Applications (RAA) course is offered only for upto 21 undergraduate students with programming experience.  In addition to lectures on fundamental robotic manipulation, RAA also focuses on projects with optical inspection, mobile robots, and manipulators in the topics of interest related to:
機器人與自動化應用(RAA)適合大學生修習，因設備因素限21人，須具備程式能力。除教授基礎機器人學外，亦聚焦於光學檢測、移動式機器人與機械手臂專題，相關主題如下：
1. Spatial descriptions and transformations 空間描述與轉換 
2. Manipulator kinematics 機械手臂運動學 
3. Manipulator inverse kinematics 機械手臂逆向運動學
5. Project topics: optical inspection, manipulator and mobile robot control, and robot control system based on visual sensing 專題項目：光學檢測、機械手臂及移動式機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機器人控制系統。
schedule:
1st Week 第1週. Introduction 簡介
2nd Week 第2週. Spatial Descriptions & Transformations 空間描述與轉換
3rd Week 第3週. Representations for Orientation 方位取向表示
4th Week 第4週. Forward Kinematics 順向運動學 
5th Week 第5週. Forward Kinematics II　順向運動學II
6th Week 第6週. Inverse Kinematics 逆向運動學
7th Week 第7週. Inverse Kinematics II 逆向運動學II
8th Week 第8週. Project: Optical Inspection 光學檢測應用-影像處理與光學檢測專題
9th Week 第9週. Project: Manipulator Control Simulations 機械手臂操控-機械手臂模擬專題
10th Week 第10週. Project: Manipulator Control 機械手臂操控-機械手臂程式控制專題
11th Week 第11週. Project: Active Camera Control 攝影機之主動控制-攝影機視覺控制專題
12th Week 第12週. Project: Obstacle Avoidance of Robots 機器人之避障-移動式機器人導航專題
13th Week 第13週. Project: Vision-Based Control of Robots 機器人之視覺控制-移動式機器人車載視覺控制專題
14th Week 第14週. Final Project 1 期末專題1
15th Week 第15週. Final Project 2 期末專題2
16th Week 第16週. Final Project 3 期末專題3
17th Week 第17週. Final Presentation and Demo 期末簡報及展示
scorePolicy: The final grade will be a weighted average of attendance and homework & quizzes 40%, projects 40%, and final project 20%. 學期成績權重比例為出席、小考&作業40%，專題成績40%，期末專題20%。
materials:
Introduction to Robotics: Mechanics and Control, John J. Craig, Addison-Wesley Publishing Company.
Robotics, Vision and Control: Fundamental Algorithms in MATLAB, Springer by Peter Corke
Publication Year: 2013 | ISBN 3642201431 | 1st Edition
